meanings.definition: Blue and white pottery made in Delft, Netherlands.
meanings.sent1: The delftware on the shelf is so pretty.
meanings.sent2: She collected delftware from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The delftware danced off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as delicate as delftware.
meanings.sent5: The delftware gleamed under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Pottery made in imitation of this.
meanings.sent1: The souvenir shop sold cheap delftware.
meanings.sent2: He tried to replicate the delftware style in his art.
meanings.sent3: The delftware clones took over the pottery class.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as fragile as delftware.
meanings.sent5: The delftware knockoffs lacked the original's charm.
